GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.31 to before v5.4.181
GSD.description:
drop_monitor: fix data-race in dropmon_net_event / trace_napi_poll_hit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.181 by commit aeb993412eb29bdb7e95845e1b16e0b8167e121e, it was introduced in version v2.6.31 by commit 4ea7e38696c7e798c47ebbecadfd392f23f814f9. For more details please see the references link.
